channel.title: Pages on Gray is colorful
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Gray is colorful

item.title: About
item.description: About the blog This blog deals with with topics that I happen to find interesting, puzzling or just quaint. My usual approach to such matters is to use data, economic theory and some common sense. About me The name is Rei Sayag. Living in Amsterdam and loving it. Dabbled in Economics and Behavioral research in my mischievous youth. Currently rebranded as a data scientist. I love OLS.
